QuestData.Title: Grimtotem in the Post
QuestData.Description: You must do away with the Grimtotem invaders at Freewind Post. They brought it on themselves, the cowards!$B$BWe can't take the fight to their territory with our back to them. Please help us take back our home, $c.
QuestData.CompletionText: If we're to going to push back these Grimtotem mongrels, you're going to have to kill more of them than that, $c!
QuestData.RewardText: It's a good start. Normally, I wouldn't wish harm on any of the Earth Mother's creatures.$B$BBut attacking us at our most vulnerable moment?! They deserve to die!
